vote\/delete_site: Are you sure you want to delete this site?
vote\/message: Message to display at top of Vote page (This can be left blank)
vote\/message_maximum: Your vote message must be a maximum of 2048 characters
vote\/new_update_available_x: There is a new update available for the module {{module}}
vote\/new_urgent_update_available_x: There is a new urgent update available for the module {{module}}. Please update as soon as possible!
vote\/site_name_maximum: The site name must be a maximum of 64 characters.
vote\/site_name_minimum: The site name must be a minimum of 2 characters.
vote\/site_url_maximum: The site url must be a maximum of 255 characters.
vote\/site_url_minimum: The site url must be a minimum of 10 characters.
